page.title: 09TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content:
We conducted a survey of traffic passing along the principal minor road that runs through the area:- a: number of vehicles travelling south on Chesham Road. b: number of vehicles travelling south that turn right to Cholesbury. c: number of vehicles travelling north on Chesham Road. d: number of vehicles travelling north that turn left to Cholesbury. Cars Lorries/vans Farm vehicles a: 50 8 3 b: 31 12 0 c: 39 5 1 d: 15 8 3
These figures were recorded during a two-hour period of an early Wednesday afternoon in mid-summer.
